content:
See if those folders are subscribed:

- on the main mail screen in the L. column, R. click the account (just above the Inbox) > Subscribe
creator: siffemoz

content: Thanks for the prompt reply. I followed your advice but the only account in the drop down box is my Gmail account. I cannot bring up either of my other accounts in the subscribe windows. Mike
